manipulators.description: Right Control + . -> Left Command + Shift + B

rules.description: right_control + left_shift + x,c,v → cut, copy, paste

manipulators.description: tmux: 前のウィンドウ (Right_Cmd+I → Left_Cmd+I)
tmux: 次のウィンドウ (Right_Cmd+O → Left_Cmd+O)
Neovim: カーソル位置を戻る
Neovim: カーソル位置を進む

rules.description: right_command + h, j, k, l, ;, : → left_shift + tab, left_option + left ...
right command + u / p → desktop left / right
right command + i, o → change order
right_control + i, j, k, l → up, left, down, right
right_control + m, <, >, / → left_shift + tab, left_option + left ...
Ghostty: Right_Cmd+J/;/K/L/I/O → F13,F16-F20 (直接変換) - DISABLED

right command + u / p → desktop left / right
right command + i, o → change order
right_control + h, j, k, l → left, down, up, right (vim)
right_control + m, <, >, / → left_shift + tab, left_option + left ...
